scripts.start: npm install && npm run build:shared && npm run start:server
scripts.start:client: cd client && npm install && npm run start
scripts.start:server: cd server && npm install && npm run start
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:shared: cd shared && npm install && npm run build
